Welcome to Exclusive Properties

Your source for the best selection of Isle of Palms Vacation Rentals!

Isle of Palms is a gorgeous tropical paradise, located conveniently close to Charleston, SC and everything this wonderful city has to offer. A South Carolina coast vacation on Isle of Palms means that you’ll be immersed in a world of stunning seaside scenery, fun activities, and fascinating attractions. We love our beautiful barrier island on the Atlantic Ocean and want visitors to experience the best of it by staying in one of our luxury IOP beach rentals!

Our array of Isle of Palms vacation rentals are in the best parts of Isle of Palms, and only a short drive from the charm and history of downtown Charleston. At each IOP rental, you’ll find incredible views, personality, and an amazing blend of amenities. Choose from a variety of our Isle of Palms house rentals ranging from 4-12 bedrooms, and start planning your beach vacation today!
View Our Live Surfcam

What Our Guests Are Saying
As a person who is in the marketing business, am use to trying to find the right words. But when it comes to describing this property, truly think that words cannot describe what an awesome place this is for large families and groups. Had 21 people stay here and we all had accommodations that go over the top. Plenty of room for everybody and first class in every way. One amazing thing about this house is despite everything being luxurious, the house still has some of those touches that make it feel warm and welcoming. And the folks are Exclusive Properties are really friendly folks who balance good customer service with genuine caring about their guests. Thank you so much Exclusive Properties for making this one of the most memorable incredible get togethers ever for our family!! 
Rick
There is not enough space to detail how much we loved our stay! Everything was perfect!! Simply everything! We want to return year after year— and Megan and team went out of their way for us'. Just an amazing weekend! Thank you so much! 
Mindy

Our family vacation worked out perfectly as little children and adults all had their own room/baths which made for very happy people. Shelly and Megan were very responsive to a couple of issues and very delightful. Having the pool heated was a good choice for our group, having dinners catered spoiled all of us. Poe's (on Sullivan Island) is a favorite dinner choice of our group as is buying fresh seafood at Shem Creek.

Susie

Each summer we try to take our children and grandsons to a beach location and after many other locations we fell in love with Isle of Palms. The most important ingredient to our new love affair is this amazing home. It is incredibly clean and convenient with comfortable elegance. We have small grandsons and it is a perfect home for families. They enjoyed the pool, screened in porches and quick access to the beach, near by restaurants..kid friendly. The listing description is very accurate! And absolutely not a bug insight the entire week, coming from the north where we are not used to your local creatures, that was important to us! We will return to Isle of Palms and to this lovely home. Thanks to the owner for sharing with us. We created wonderful memories!

Cheri
